query.statement:
SELECT CEBSTCOD AS CEBSTCOD , CEBSTDNO AS CEBSTDNO , CEBSTPJT AS CEBSTPJT , CEBSTHGB AS CEBSTHGB , CEBSTHNO AS CEBSTHNO , CEBSTITN AS CEBSTITN , CEBSTMGB AS CEBSTMGB , CEBSTUMG AS CEBSTUMG , CEBSTCGA AS CEBSTCGA , CEBSTSPR AS CEBSTSPR , CEBSTRQQ AS CEBSTRQQ , CEBSTSAM AS CEBSTSAM , CEBSTESA AS CEBSTESA , CEBSTCYJ AS CEBSTCYJ , CEBSTATT AS CEBSTATT , CEBSTRM1 AS CEBSTRM1 , CEBSTRM2 AS CEBSTRM2 , CEBSTMNO AS CEBSTMNO , CEBSTPST AS CEBSTPST , CEBSTVSQ AS CEBSTVSQ , CEBSTVIQ AS CEBSTVIQ , CEBSTPRQ AS CEBSTPRQ , CEBSTRCD AS CEBSTRCD , CEBSTPRN AS CEBSTPRN , CEBSTBJD AS CEBSTBJD , CEBSTPIQ AS CEBSTPIQ , CEBSTISQ AS CEBSTISQ , CEBSTLID AS CEBSTLID , CEBSTIHQ AS CEBSTIHQ , CEBSTLRD AS CEBSTLRD , CEBSTCQT AS CEBSTCQT , CEBSTCSY AS CEBSTCSY , CEBSTSCQ AS CEBSTSCQ , CEBSTRTQ AS CEBSTRTQ , CEBSASPT AS CEBSASPT -- 고객명 , CEBSANAM AS CEBSANAM -- 현장명 , CEBSBTYP AS CEBSBTYP -- 기종 , CEBSBUSE AS CEBSBUSE -- 용도 , CEBSBPSN AS CEBSBPSN -- 인승 , CEBSBSPD AS CEBSBSPD -- 속도 , CEBSBHNA AS CEBSBHNA -- 동호기명 , CEORTDES AS CEORTDES -- 자재명 , CEORTSPE AS CEORTSPE -- SPEC , CEBSSRQD AS CEBSSRQD -- 청구일 FROM EVLADM.TBEBSSF1, EVLADM.TBEBSTF1 LEFT OUTER JOIN EVLADM.TBEBSBF1 ON CEBSBPJT = CEBSTPJT AND CEBSBHGB = CEBSTHGB AND CEBSBHNO = CEBSTHNO LEFT OUTER JOIN EVLADM.TBEBSAF1 ON CEBSAPJT = CEBSTPJT LEFT OUTER JOIN EVLADM.TBEORTF1 ON CEBSTITN = CEORTITO WHERE CEBSTPJT || CEBSTHGB || CEBSTHNO = #PJT# AND CEBSSRQD LIKE #YEAR# || '%' AND CEBSTCOD = CEBSSCOD AND CEBSTDNO = CEBSSDNO ORDER BY CEBSTPJT,CEBSTHGB,CEBSTHNO,CEBSTDNO,CEBSTMNO
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
